>can i just be a fucking leech on soulseek?
You can try. But you'll probably be blocked for refusing to share.
>i want to download music without putting anything back up or seeding. don't know exactly what seeding is but from what i do know, i don't like it.
Seeding just means you leave files and software available for people to download. Otherwise you're just a leech and people tend not to like it on file sharing networks.

>>83542828
You can share whatever you want. Back in the early 00s I primarily used it for sharing drum and bass / jungle / dubstep and speed garage tracks. I also shared cracked DAW software and sound packs for said software. I haven't used it in 10+ years though.

posts.com:
>IF YOU WANT AN UPGRADE OR BUILD ADVICE
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR
Convenient lister: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases (e.g. 4K editing, high FPS gaming)
State budget and region

>NEWS
12th Gen Alder Lake available November. Ryzen 5000 3D Cache refresh Q1 2022. Zen 4 with DDR5 and AM5 mobos coming late 2022, and 13th gen Intel Raptor Lake Q4 2022.

>RECOMMENDED CPUs
HTPC(4K60)/Web Browsing: Athlon 3000G, Pentium G6400
Budget Gaming: i3-10105/F
Mid-range Gaming: i5-10400/F
High-end Gaming: R5 5600X
Mid-range Multicore: R7 3700X, i7-10700/F, R5 5800X
High-end Multicore: R9 5900X, R9 5950X

>RECOMMENDED GPU PERFORMANCE LEVEL
Budget 1080p: Used GTX 1060 3GB, RX 570 4GB
Mid-range 1080p: RTX 3060, RX 6600 XT
High-end 1080p : RTX 3060 Ti, RX 6700 XT
High-end 1440p: RTX 3070/Ti, RX 6800
Mid-range 2160p: RTX 3080, RX 6800 XT
High-end 2160p: RTX 3080 Ti, RX 6900 XT, RTX 3090

>RECOMMENDED RAM
Capacity: 2x8GB or 2x16GB
Speed and CAS Latency: 3200/3600MHz CL16
Beware: Some Intel motherboards (e.g. B460) are limited to lower speeds

>RECOMMENDED COOLERS
https://pcpartpicker.com/user/SneedFeedAndSeed/saved/gmWh3C

>RECOMMENDED PSUs
Basic Web Browsing: 400-450W
Gaming: 500-850W depending on GPU (aim for 50-75% at load)
https://linustechtips.com/topic/1116640-psucultists-psu-tier-list/

>RECOMMENDED SSDs
Standouts: WD SN750
https://ssd.borecraft.com/

>MOTHERBOARD INFO:
AM4 B550/X570 - CPU-less BIOS flash feature advisable if pairing with Zen 3
https://linustechtips.com/topic/1137619-motherboard-vrm-tier-list-v2-currently-amd-only/
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1yPS3hj_K7EPT4RBWCyjdKNP56pnwDz-IgBc0975-FUg
